title: Writing from the Margins (with Susan Ellen Finlay)
itunes:title: Writing from the Margins (with Susan Ellen Finlay)
description:
Jessa talks to writer Susan Ellen Finlay (Objektophilia) about the difficult position of small, independent publishers in today's cultural climate. 

http://jessacrispin.com

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
